website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for an innovated way to cover your off-season tires, these totes offer a convenient handle design, durability, and an impressive warranty.
pros: A set of four durable tire totes that stand out for their sturdy handles
Easy to cover, store and maneuver tires when not in use
cons: Leaves wheels exposed – the company offers tire felts to cover them that must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: Older Tire Rack Krugos feel much higher quality
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this 3 stars, but that is in comparison to the Krugo Tire Rack labelled covers (purchased as long ago as 2009). I bought these because I couldnt readily find a wrap (long story) amd figured I was due for a new set anyway. I like that they had a label for which tire it comes from. However, the fabric seemed flimsier and it did not feel secure when moving the tire. I went digging to find my missing wrap. Same brand, minimal price difference, but it just doesnt feel the same. It is possible that all of the newer ones are made the same, please know I am comparing my older Tire Rack to this order.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Very tights and nice fit. Very clean look and it also included ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my OEM 2016 VW GTI 18" wheels and aftermarket 19" wheels. Very tights and nice fit. Very clean look and it also included a little clear pocket where one can specify the tire position and/or make notes. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Kuznetsov

customer_reviews.title: Great for Transporting Tires
customer_reviews.text: It's the end of the season and you're needing to put those Winters/All-Seasons on the car, but you recall how last time you had those tires in your car they left a mess of dirt and dust. Well if you don't any giant plastic bags to toss your tires into thanks to a timely ban on plastic bags, then you'll need to look elsewhere for a tire cover. Try these totes. They are super easy to wrap around the tires, they come with a handy car diagram for marking which tire they are, and the tires look nicer with the totes covering them than any plastic bag could.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Martin

customer_reviews.title: They fit, easy to put on and off,
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the covers wouldn’t fit the rear wheels/tires. The tires are very wide 315/30ZR-20. They fit fine. The quality is great. They are easy to put on and take off the wheels,tires.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE FRITSCH

customer_reviews.title: Might work for small wheels definitely doesn’t for large ones.
customer_reviews.text: For a 20 inches wheel, this will not fully cover, also the way it holds makes it fold very easily not protecting the rim at all, it’s very hard to hold it in place, and it has a metal ring in the middle that highly likely will scratch the wheels if they shake. This might work for small wheels but they should change how it is made for the large wheels. If your wheel is bigger than 18” I highly do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Careful! Fit only small wheels
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to complement my Kurgo seasonal totes. The description sets the same wheel size limits as the totes. What the description fails to highlight is that when the wheels are big (mine are Tesla Model X ones), the totes are fine, but the felts are not covered by the totes at all and just barely cover the opening. So you cannot leave the felts on the wheels when you carry them. They are useful only when you stack them up. I am a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Lextrait

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made Wheel Covers
customer_reviews.text: I received the Kurgo Wheel Felts (covers) at the same time as the tire bags which was convenient. These wheel covers are much more substantial than expected. They get tucked into the opening of each tire bag and serve to protect the face of the alloy wheel. Elastisized straps are provided for securing the felt covers to the wheel bag and are adjustable. The diameter of the felt covers is very generous. More than ample overlap is provided to ensure that the entire face of the BMW alloy wheel is covered and protected; a highly endorsed product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Fit!!
customer_reviews.text: I have large tires, 295/45 Rim 20 on my GC SRT. I was afraid i wouldn't get tire totes that would fit my tires but these are awesome. Combined with the felt pads I purchased to protect the faces of my rims, I'm confident these will hold up over the many seasons of tire changes I anticipate in the future. I'm totally satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Black Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and easy to wrap around tire. The handle is very helpful and even when carrying them one handed the tire doesn’t feel like it’s gonna fall out. I’m using them for my rims and tires during the winter month. The price point is a little high but after seeing some of the cheaper options I’d definitely buy these Kurgo ones again. Don’t waste your money do it right the first time.
customer_reviews.author: E.Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Great product but a misleading title
customer_reviews.text: Great product for storing and protecting your wheels and tires when not in use. They seem to fit various sizes wheels and went over my 19" wheels with room to spare. Took some getting used too getting these on but rolling the tire into these seemed to be the easiest eay. Only downside is that the title can be a little misleading, I originally thought the felt covers were included but they appear to be an added accessory. Still they do what their supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: th3hooligan

customer_reviews.title: Keep clean, and recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Beyond love it! They are perfect for the "snow tires" and "summer" tires that I keep. No more plastic bags that rip, and they have a little place to put a card, so I can keep track of which vehicle they belong to. I stay clean, the car stays clean, and more importantly the guys at the shop are not annoyed to work with them, simple velcro, and off. (My brother is a mechanic and did not complain about them being cumbersome.). Only my two cars have snow tires, but I tried it on my Jeep larger tire, and it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M Cassick

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do what I needed, but they seemed OK?
customer_reviews.text: My goal was to use these between a stack of tires where I had 19" wheels with tires mounted, but, didn't figure on the tires having curb rash protection so these pretty much set inside that rubber lip being rather pointless. Sent them back for a refund thanks to Amazon's return policy. They are thick and would have done well, but needed to be 1-3" larger for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: jenksdrummer

customer_reviews.title: Great tire tottes
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical looking at the price ranges of these products at Amazon. Went with these, the more expensive one and glad I did, these are well designed, that can be wrapped around the tire and closed/tightened with a Velcro. Look and feels very sturdy and are great looking! Time will tell how well these last. One aspect I didn’t realize before buying is that these covers don’t fully cover your tire, are more a wrap around with a handle but does the job very well. Expensive but a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Father's Day gift. My family was tired of watching me carry tires to the basement in trash bags when swapping the snow tires. These totes have worked great so far. They were very easy to install on the tire (22" tires), and made carrying them a whole lot easier. I will be buying more for the other 2 cars.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnM

customer_reviews.title: Great tire covers!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described, and the velco feels tough and durable. These covered almost my entire rim for my 2017 Chevy Cruze tires. Work great for carrying the tires as well. The only down side would be the sheet of paper they give you for indicating which tire is in the carrier - looks very cheap, and could have been something like a colored plastic with a legend for what goes where. Other than that, these are great, if a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Shukero

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for seasonable tire changes
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought these two years ago when I first started buying winter tires. Before ordering I worried they might be too big for the tires for my 2016 Corolla, but the velcro adjusts to fit them well. The handle, which seems to be decently reinforced, makes the tires much easier to carry than to manhandle them without. The carrier also keeps dirt and small rocks from falling out of the tire grooves into the car when transporting. Well worth it on many levels!
customer_reviews.author: Crypticphrasing

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives in an apartment in Colorado and stores her snow tires in my garage. The tire store always puts two tires per bag after changing them out and I cuss endlessly anytime I need to move them. Well now, they are easy to move and it looks nice. The tires are for a small sedan and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Clarita

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but these are durable. 3 years of varying tires/wheel around and these keep the car clean, the tires and wheels in reasonable shape and make moving them much easier Pros- durable, convenient, easy to Figure out with a few Minutes Cons- ensure the tire/wheel is properly Strapped or can be combersome to move
customer_reviews.author: dominic

customer_reviews.title: Great for Apartments
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use, fits my 17" tires, plenty adjustable for bigger or smaller tires. I used to store my off-season tires in trash bags. They were a mess, and terrible to move around. These bags make it so much easier to carry my 4x wheel-mounted tires up/down 3 flights of stairs to my apartment. Once inside, they keep the carpets nice and clean too. Really a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting my spare motorcycle wheels
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in addition to the Kurgo seasonal tire totes. Between the two products they are the perfect solution for storing and transporting my 2nd set of motorcycle wheels for my track bike. These are thick enough to protect the sides of the wheel and more importantly the rotors. In addition they protect the interior of my car from getting dirty or banged up when I load them in for a track day.
customer_reviews.author: Bloose

customer_reviews.title: Fit - Form - Function
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and professional appearance. Will keep your clean tires during storage and look great in the process.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Using these between my stacked summer tires. I've only had them for a month right now, but they seem thick and durable. They have a hole in the middle with rubber straps with clips to connect the felts to tire bags. The hole also helps with a little bit of breathability.
customer_reviews.author: sdm1177

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: These are too small to properly cover the wheel faces of 21” wheels. These are combined with the Kurgo tire covers on some 275/40/21 wheels from my wife’s Volvo XC90. Your application may vary based on actual tire diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: need to improve Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: quality control needs improvement. 2 of the covers did not have velcro sewed on in critical spots. Due to time constraints, I opted to not return the covers, but instead fixed them myself. Beside the poor quality control, the covers are otherwise very nice.
customer_reviews.author: LT. John

customer_reviews.title: Economical way to store, carry, and protect seasonal tires.
customer_reviews.text: Easily fits and covered my snow wheels and tires between seasons. If you properly wrap these on the sides and along the tread there's no slop when picking them up by the handle. They include a clear pouch to insert paper noting where they were mounted which helps with seasonal rotation. Perfect for my 17" wheels and Nokian snow tires.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon N.

customer_reviews.title: Thin, not much padding
customer_reviews.text: The clips are not terribly sturdy or easy to open. As others have said, you need wheel totes or something similar to clip onto - these can't just go on bare wheels. These will protect your wheels from minor scratches, but they are pretty thin and floppy. They don't provide much padding to protect from bigger dings. I got my winter tires and wheels from Tire Rack, and they came sandwiched between two pieces of cardboard to protect the wheels. I ended up using the cardboard on the outside of the wheel felts in order to give the wheels some more protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to durability as we have only had them one season. But they were easy to use. We use them to hold/ID our winter/summer tires when they aren’t In use. I appreciate the card that helps you keep track of where each tire had been located on the car. Not sure how far you could really carry them using the handles, but it helps in getting them in/out of the trunk. Keeps my car interior clean when transporting tires.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter tire sets.
customer_reviews.text: Durable, makes tires easy to transport, and keeps them enclosed so you don't get dirt on yourself when you carry them somewhere. I have winter tires for 2 vehicles, and use these to cover the unused sets and stack them in the garage. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick3

customer_reviews.title: These wrap around the tire nicely and hold them well with velcro.
customer_reviews.text: These wrap around the tire nicely and hold them well with velcro. They also have little pockets for a small paper card to denote what side and position of the car the tire came from.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID VIPOND

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: whoever designed this, installed clips that look like they can be pressed to open, but do not work. i cannot believe this was cleared for sale. the clips are closed, but the back part that you should squeeze to open, is flat so there is no ability to squeeze that size to open the clip side. waste of time, back they went.
customer_reviews.author: Dtm

customer_reviews.title: convenient way to transport and store spare tires/wheel
customer_reviews.text: Pros Provides easy transport of spare tire/wheel Inexpensive Durable Cons: Does not cover entire tire/wheel
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Buhari

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These work great. The outside (black) part is made of a more durable canva. The outer gray part is more like what you would find on a tent or umbrella. They work great, the handle is very useful, and they are very quick to install and remove. Couldn't ask for much more. I store my tires without rims. Discount Tire puts your tires in bags when you have them do a winter swap. I just put those, bag and all, inside these totes and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: JGregory

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: These work great at a fair price. These make it very easy to lift and carry my off-season tires without getting dirty. In some instances it provides a grip or handle that would not be otherwise available. I recommend adding the felt insert to protect the wheel face.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to make it easier to transport my seasonal tires and these totes are great. They cover the sidewalls to keep things clean and the handle works great. It's also much easier to store the tires in these totes. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: NewHopeBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great to transport and store wheel combos
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as described and are a great and easy way to transport and store your off-season wheel and tire combos. They even have nice little pockets to store a label to identify the driver/passenger front/rear placement.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Brice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, low cost storage option.
customer_reviews.text: Stored my second set of wheels and tires for two vehicles. Very easy to use and appear very durable. Has labels built in if you choose to use them. Coupled with the wheel felts it is a near-perfect all-weather wheel/tire storage system for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: AndyW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a low price
customer_reviews.text: I put my 20” wheels/tires in these totes and I can carry them around by the handle just fine. Durable and well priced. The felts barely cover the wheels and would be better if they were another inch or two in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: CRW1

customer_reviews.title: Winter and summer wheel storage
customer_reviews.text: I swap my 20 inch stock wheels and 22 inch wheels every spring and winter. I haven't tried them on my 22's. I put these on the 20 inch wheels they fit well with plenty of play room. I was able to carry 1 wheel on each arm using the handle. Very strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cov

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and carry!
customer_reviews.text: I had Discount Tire put these on for me when they changed out my winter tires. They're easy to carry and work well. I wish I would have told them to label each tire using the provided label on each bag, so I know what position they were in, but I'll do that next time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: I buyEVERYTHINGfromAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cover entire tire
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to discover that these covers only really cover the tread, so if you're looking to protect the entire tire from the elements in storage, these won't do it. Disappointing for $50. I need to buy another cover to completely protect my summer tires.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Having an SUV doesn't automatically mean it works great in snow and ice, tires play a big part in the performance. I have a summer and winter set of 20" SUV tires I swap every year, and these totes make the chore of lugging the tires around a ton easier!
customer_reviews.author: Team Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and Clean way to store and transfer tires!
customer_reviews.text: These tire totes are great. I've used them before, but got rid of them when I sold my last set of snow tires. Now the people that change my tires each season put the tires in these heavier bags, but I was still worried about them ripping or the bags themselves getting dirt on them. The tire totes fit each tire great. You can adjust them to fit most any tire with the Velcro. Don't get your hands or car dirty...get these tire totes!
customer_reviews.author: Fool for Christ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set at my first set was accidentally traded with my old car. These seem to hold up well, make carrying the tires easy, and keep the inside of my SUV clean while transporting to/from the shop.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, good price and very nice. EASY to use and very strong velcro. Covers the wheel as show for protection of the finish. If you're going to stack them you might still want to look into ordering pads to put on the face/good-side of your wheel to protect them as you stack. Easy lift by the built in handle and include an ID Card for marking the wheel placement such as front-left or rear-right, etc. Highly recommend these covers.
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Tamie

customer_reviews.title: but don't cover as much of my rim as I would like. They cover the tires completely
customer_reviews.text: These work well, but don't cover as much of my rim as I would like. They cover the tires completely. 20x9 wheels. Seem to be the same thing that is offered on tire rack. If you have a Belle Tire in the area, belle tire will swap your rims/tires and store them for the season for $100. So for $200 you can have year round storage and free tire rotations. Something to think about.
customer_reviews.author: Evan M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: These tire toes work great and have held up to several seasons so far. I have 18" tires mounted on rims that I change with the seasons and these go on easily and have strong handles. They have all the features I could ask for in a tire tote.
customer_reviews.author: AJ L.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used the totes to store and transport my summer tires, I got tired of the plastics bags and the handles are super helpful. Really easy to install and keeps things tidy and clean. A must have if you swap your wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Treeman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to use! SImply position the tote on the floor unwrapped, roll tire onto the tote, attach the hook and loop fasteners and you're done.
customer_reviews.author: TestMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing my wheels in the closet!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several before choosing these. I'm happy i did! Quick, easy, simple. Great quality. Will always recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ReadMoreBooks

customer_reviews.title: Functional...but...........
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a bit more out of these. They are just a flimsy 1/4" felt cover with some plastic clamps that barely cover my 20" wheel - and you NEED to have the tire tote for these to work. Not rocket science to install, but some type of instructions would have been nice. The strings attached to the clips came undone a few times right from the start - not biggie, just re-tie. All in all - these are average...they'll work I hope.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend totes
customer_reviews.text: This is for the totes 1st, Great product easy to install. Felts, they are ok. 1” larger would be better. Also one of the metal center rings came apart from the felt.
customer_reviews.author: KenMal78

customer_reviews.title: You’re not gonna get felts with the tire totes
customer_reviews.text: In the first description of the tote bags it says tote bags/felts . if you don’t read the whole description you’re going to think you’re getting felts too that’s exactly what I thought I was getting the bags and the felts need to make that clear in your first line describing your tire totes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying
customer_reviews.text: Great product, made transferring a tire/tires from one car to another so easy. Adjustable feature also made carrying very comfortable. Had to bring one into a hotel room for a few hours. This made a huge difference and the bags were delivered free overnight so we could take them on our trip! (Don't know if overnight delivery is Prime only)
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: better than keeping them bare or using the plastic the ...
customer_reviews.text: very well made product. sorry I waited so many years before buying. use them for my summer/winter tires. better than keeping them bare or using the plastic the shop gives you. they hold the tire very well. They are open so there is ventilation. The handle works well and there is plenty of Velcro to keep the tote on as you carry and store.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for storing my tires in the garage! Makes it look a bit 'sleeker' in the garage, and easier to lift/carry the tires. Also comes with cards to mark where the tire was located.
customer_reviews.author: RockDoc

customer_reviews.title: You ever look for something wrong and turn up with nothing.
customer_reviews.text: So these are great what else can I say? I guess I am mostly surprised at how well they work I would not have though some Velcro would hold like 40/lbs. Also and not that it really matters but these look really nice. Honestly just really happy with the purchase would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely constructed and look nice
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed and look nice. Used on 2015 BMW X5 wheels and tires. Fit the 19" all season tires and wheels very well although the inserts Kurgo makes to protect the wheel would be too small. Not sure how they fit the 20" performance tires and wheels as dealer stores and switches out for me so I haven't seen them on the 20". Expect they are a bit small. All wheels and tires are BMW factory.
customer_reviews.author: J S Keel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, very well made, easy to wrap tire!!
customer_reviews.text: Just love the tire bags, were perfect for storing summer tires. We are very satisfied with our purchase of these bags!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Willliams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have racing tires that I transport them in my car and these are perfect. You take your tire and wrap them around nice and tight and everything is held by the velcro, but that velcro definitely holds. I move them around so much and it has never open on me. This makes moving your tires so much easier. Also it is great to keep your hands clean and storage them withouth getting anythif dirty with the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Roman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seal airflow which is recommended for tire storage.
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for off season storage as a replacement for large plastic bags. These covers will not provide the airtight seal you want for storing soft rubber tires. Also the covers will fit a 20" wheel but will not completely cover the wheel and rubber will be exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Durable tire totes
customer_reviews.text: I recently flew from TX to CA and checked a 45lb spare tire (and rim) as baggage. The tire tote made it to the other end 100% intact. This isn't your typical use case, but the material used is very strong. The totes are quick to put on and take off. They fit my 235/40/18 summer performance tires perfectly. They could definitely accommodate much larger or smaller tires just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: These are worth the extra money, easy to use, durable and they look nice to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Fartydoo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire storage covers
customer_reviews.text: Very well made tire covers. Easily fit my 305x10x20 inch tires. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and neat!
customer_reviews.text: These tire totes are great to have for storing my 2nd set of wheels amd tires. They even have a handle for carrying your wheel with tire though depending on the weight of a combo (mine are about 60 lbs each) can be a little ackward. The velcro fasterner is quite sufficient and strong enough to keep a wheel/tire enclosed when moving around. Great product for protecting your wheels and tires while keeping you and your clothing neat and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lorentz W Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying your tires
customer_reviews.text: Love them, they make carrying my summer & winter tires around very easy. they also make it easy to swing them up into the trunk or to stack them for storage. They usually last about 5-6 years before the elastic wears out.
customer_reviews.author: kdamon

customer_reviews.title: Soft and thick
customer_reviews.text: These work out great, they keep things clean and contained.
customer_reviews.author: Thumperb

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to put on and pretty sturdy. After seeing how they were put together I thought the velcro might fail leaving me with damaged wheels as I hauled them to the attic in my garage, but not to be. They held tight and made them easy to carry up a step ladder. May purchase others.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to store my winter tires in and they work great
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks like they will fit a wide range of tire sizes. Easy to load and remove wheels and tires. Holds them securely; can easily carry the weight of an 18" aluminum wheel with mounted tire. Most importantly of all, keeps the back seat of my car clean when transporting wheels and tires to the shop for seasonal changes.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great for seasonal tire storage
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Got these to make taking 3 sets of seasonal tires out of crawl space in the basement easier. Easy to put on the tires, Love the handles for carrying. Just wish they came in different colors for easier identification!
customer_reviews.author: Ania S

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for your tire storage! Fit was perfect and very nice quality! I purchased the felt covers as well for the added protection! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought these sooner. Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These things vastly exceeded expectations. They're clearly not built for racing or frequent (say, weekly) use, but for seasonal use, such as for swapping summer and winter tires) they're fantastic. Great handle, very pleasing application and removal, thoughtful touches like velcro in key places and labels to indicate which tire is inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Ivey

customer_reviews.title: I use these to store my track wheels and tires ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these to store my track wheels and tires in. I bring my track wheels to the track on my back seat so covering them with this keeps me from having tires touch my seats. The wheels are covered with brake dust so you still need to wipe them down before you put them in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Wow -Beats bags any day!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate having winter tires in oversized garbage bags. It makes them hard to carry and store. This is a nice universal solution. No complaints! Works as I imagined!
customer_reviews.author: Chuchi*

customer_reviews.title: Good storage solution, if a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Easy-on. These close with just a good bit of velcro, but you would be surprised as to just how much weight a bit of velcro can hold!
customer_reviews.author: Lash LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Great Tire tote
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to wrap and carry my seasonal tires. Mine came with a pocket and note card to annotate the tire location on the vehicle. I recommend marking your tires, but its a nice feature. And per the packaging, they also have other uses such as a pinata hat or underwear. Although, I didn't try those "features".
customer_reviews.author: ByteTime

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and under deliver
customer_reviews.text: For such an expensive cost I expected the quality to be better. From the first time mounting the metal ring which the bungee's go through broke on one of the wheel felts. The bungee's were also poorly designed and cheap cheap quality. I'd recommend saving money and cutting out cardboard rather than these.
customer_reviews.author: Bugalydosh

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly on my 45 20R 245's
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid construction, price was fair. Hopefully these hold up season in and season out.
customer_reviews.author: Pam (Chicago)

customer_reviews.title: Added protection!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and work exactly as described! Used with their wheel totes and am very happy with the quality and fit of both!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the handle works great and easily supports the weight of the tire
customer_reviews.text: These work exactly as described. These are expandable and fit around a variety of tire sizes, and secure tightly around the tire using the velcro. Once secured, the handle works great and easily supports the weight of the tire. These totes make it so much easier to carry two wheels/tires at once!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sturdy, and easily adjusted.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly to transport my tires in my very small car so that nothing got all over the seats. They are very easy to put on, adjust with the velcro strips and hold very tightly thanks to the strips of velcro being quite large. I had no doubt that the tires were secure when picking it up by the carrying handle.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip May

customer_reviews.title: Great for race tire transport
customer_reviews.text: I use two sets of these, one for off-season tires, and one for racing tires. They're extremely useful for transporting soft race tires on an open trailer, but aren't extremely effective as seasonal tire storage. I wrap these in garbage bags for seasonal storage, which seems to help prevent dryrot.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: These tire covers are terrific. They’re easy to put on and make carrying tires much easier.
customer_reviews.author: LG45120

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy to tote your tires and helps keep them clean during storage
customer_reviews.text: These are as described and work great. They hold the tire securely, and the built in handle makes them easy to move around. My only complaint is that they're a little bit expensive for what they are, IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: They do what I need them to do
customer_reviews.text: I pulled a piece of metal out of one of the covers. Luckily i found it before I placed them on my wheel. It was woven into the cover. Otherwise they are fine. A bit overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Julie Trifiletti

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for storing race slicks. Their sizing by diameter is correct. Even though the slicks are 28" by 12 " wide they fit fine. Like the Velcro closure design.
customer_reviews.author: hsbrighton

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the Garage Neat
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep my tires out of the way and easily transportable when switching between the stock wheels and the dedicated snow tires. I really like the fact that there's a clear pocket for you to indicate where the tire was originally mounted.
customer_reviews.author: SingleStack230

customer_reviews.title: Product performs as described.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something other than trash bags for off season storage of an extra set of tires for a Ford Escape. These are a perfect fit for the 235/65R17 tires, but will accept tires a little larger than these. They seem to be well made. If your desire is to keep all UV light rays from reaching your rubber, these will not do so by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Pillboy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased these to protect my wheel / tire package in storage... very easy to use... quite stretchable and had no difficulty in putting in a 19 inch wheel / tire with 45/50 aspect ratio tires
customer_reviews.author: ZeroSeVen

customer_reviews.title: Felt barely covered the wheels when used with the Kurgo Tire Totes
customer_reviews.text: The Kurgo Wheel Felt covers where a disappointment when bought with the Kurgo Tire Totes (worked great). The Wheel Felts were undersized and did not center/sit right when used with the totes.
customer_reviews.author: A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy to carry my wheels and tires around and theres ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these from a local car shop for my old set of wheels. Found out they are here on amazon as well and got myself a second set for my winter tires. Makes it easy to carry my wheels and tires around and theres even a slot for a small index card to keep track of which wheel/tire was where so you can rotate them later on.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W.

customer_reviews.title: Protects my stored wheels well
customer_reviews.text: Works great to protect my 19" wheel/tire set that is in storage. I have several sets of these, purchased from various places. I think they're all made by the same company.
customer_reviews.author: N. S. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Great Covers
customer_reviews.text: Love these covers! Kept the trunk and my hands clean when transporting the all seasons back from the tire place to my garage for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Misleading AD
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the ad shows and talks about the tire covers??? No covers are included, so assuming you have to buy those separately??? You only get the felts! Ad is very misleading!!!
customer_reviews.author: MTH

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel protection.
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Use them for my Tesla Model 3 summer wheels. You need the Kurgo tire storage bags.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for focus RS wheels
customer_reviews.text: Got these to house my winter (18") and summer (19") focus RS wheels. Work great so far and I like the little placard that goes under the handle to mark your wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Agrasto

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Fit tires well. Not as easy to carry as described. Used for 225/45/17.
customer_reviews.author: GMPW77

customer_reviews.title: Track Day Totes
customer_reviews.text: Great tire totes for track days so they don’t get the inside of my car dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Dan V.

customer_reviews.title: This product will protect your wheelset
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect idea to protect expensive wheel sets. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: David B Bellefeuille

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Kinda disappointed, I have 2018 vw MK7.5 GTI wheels that I have to store over winter on my balcony, and I order this product because It showed that I would get wheel bags and covers, and I spent $50 on just a bags that only protects my tires.
customer_reviews.author: Aldin Mehinovic

product_meta.title: Kurgo Seasonal Tire Tote | Spare Tire Cover | Portable Wheel Bags | Winter Tire Cover | Eco-Friendly Tire Totes | Handle for Easy Transportation | Universal Fit
product_meta.description:
Style:Tire Totes - 4 Pack| Color:RegularKurgo's Seasonal Tire Totes reduce the mess and hassle of seasonal tire change by covering winter tires to protect your clothing and car interior from grime. Combine these tire bags with Kurgo Wheel Felts (sold separately) to prevent rims from nicks and scratches. The built-in handle on these tire covers makes them easy to carry and store. Durable construction on tire tote extends the life of the tire and help keeps your garage organized. One size fits most passenger vehicles (22"" - 31"" diameter tires). Set of 4 bags - Kurgo Wheel Felts sold separately. Machine washable. 

Arithmetic to calculate diameter of tire: 

W: Section Width
H: Section Height
D: Rim Diameter

Formula: (W*(2*(H/100))/25.4)+D

For example:
Section Width: 225
Section Height: 55
Rim Diameter: 16


(225*(2*(55/100))/25.4)+16 = 25.74

Therefore, your Tire Diameter = 25.74”; and since this product fits tires 22” to 31” in diameter, your tires would be a perfect fit. 

For further clarification, please contact our customer service team at 877-847-3868 or info@kurgo.com
feature_bullets: Tire Cover with Handle for Easy Lifting: Tire totes keep your winter tires protected & organized when not in use. Wheel bags protect your clothing & car interior from grime. Tire bags reduce the mess of tire change. Includes handle for easy transportation.
Wheel Tote Protects Tires During the Off Season: Tire bag is made from durable materials to protect tires from the elements. Perfect seasonal tire cover or spare tire cover. Easily stack for storage.
Set of 4 Bags Included: Four Kurgo Tire Totes are included. Recommended combining tire totes with Kurgo Wheel Felts (sold separately) to protect wheel rims for full coverage.

Sizing & Fit: Tire protectors fit tires 22”-31” in diameter (90% of passenger vehicle tires are 22” – 31” in diameter). For more information on how to properly measure your tire, please see the Product Description below.

Lifetime Warranty: These original and patented tire totes come with a Lifetime Warranty against manufacturer defects when purchased new from an authorized seller. Please call Kurgo customer service for more information.
